colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(CES RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI TSOGS 'KHOR GYI CHO GA RNAL 'BYOR ROL PA'I DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG, ZHVA DMAR SNGAGS PA GU RU BKRA SHIS KYIS BSKUL BA DANG, LHA 'DI NYID YI DAM DU BYED PA MANG PA LA'ANG PHAN PAR @007B MTHONG NAS, RGYAL KHAMS NYUL BA'I DHARMA BADZRA GYIS TSOGS 'KHOR SPYI DANG SGO BSTUN CING YIG RNYING GI DGONG PA DANG YANG MI 'GAL BAR, RNA TSOGS DBYIGS CES PA SHING MO SBRUL GYI LO MI'I DBANG PO WANG RATNA SID SDI'I PHO BRANG DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG BLO BZANG KUN DGA' PAS BGYIS SO, ,MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
